00011 SmearingImporter::SmearingImporter(std::vector<TString> regionList, TString energyBranchName, TString commonCut):
00012   //  _chain(chain),
00013   _regionList(regionList),
00014   _scaleToy(1.01),
00015   _constTermToy(0.01),
00016   _energyBranchName(energyBranchName),
00017   _commonCut(commonCut),
00018   _eleID("loose"),
00019   _usePUweight(true),
00020   _useMCweight(true),
00021   _useR9weight(false),
00022   _usePtweight(false),
00023   _excludeByWeight(true),
00024   _onlyDiagonal(false),
00025   _isSmearingEt(false),
00026   cutter(false)
00027 {
00028   cutter.energyBranchName=energyBranchName;

00031 
00032 SmearingImporter::regions_cache_t SmearingImporter::GetCacheToy(Long64_t nEvents, bool isMC){
00033   regions_cache_t cache;
00034   TStopwatch myClock;
00035   myClock.Start();
00036 
00037   for(std::vector<TString>::const_iterator region_ele1_itr = _regionList.begin();
00038       region_ele1_itr != _regionList.end();
00039       region_ele1_itr++){
00040     for(std::vector<TString>::const_iterator region_ele2_itr = region_ele1_itr;
00041         region_ele2_itr != _regionList.end();
00042         region_ele2_itr++){
00043       event_cache_t eventCache;
00044       if(!(_onlyDiagonal && region_ele2_itr != region_ele1_itr))
00045         ImportToy(nEvents, eventCache, isMC);
00046       cache.push_back(eventCache);
00047     }
00048   }
00049   myClock.Stop();
00050   myClock.Print();
00051   return cache;
00052 }
00053 
00054 void SmearingImporter::ImportToy(Long64_t nEvents, event_cache_t& eventCache, bool isMC){
00055   TRandom3 gen(12345);
00056   if(isMC) nEvents*=2;
00057   //std::cout << "[DEBUG] constTermToy = " << _constTermToy << std::endl;
00058   for(Long64_t iEvent=0; iEvent < nEvents; iEvent++){
00059     ZeeEvent event;
00060     event.weight=1;
00061     event.energy_ele1=45;
00062     event.energy_ele2=45;
00063     event.invMass = gen.BreitWigner(91.188,2.48);
00064     if(isMC==false) event.invMass*= sqrt(gen.Gaus(_scaleToy, _constTermToy) * gen.Gaus(_scaleToy, _constTermToy));//gen.Gaus(_scaleToy, _constTermToy); //
00065     eventCache.push_back(event);
00066   }
00067   return;
00068 }

00071 
00072 void SmearingImporter::Import(TTree *chain, regions_cache_t& cache, TString oddString, bool isMC, Long64_t nEvents, bool isToy, bool externToy){
00073 
00074   TRandom3 gen(0);
00075   if(!isMC) gen.SetSeed(12345);
00076   TRandom3 excludeGen(12345);
00077   Long64_t excludedByWeight=0, includedEvents=0;
00078 
00079   // for the energy calculation
00080   Float_t         energyEle[2];
00081   Float_t         corrEle_[2]={1,1};
00082   Float_t         smearEle_[2]={1,1};
00083   // for the angle calculation
00084   Float_t         etaEle[2];
00085   Float_t         phiEle[2];
00086 
00087   // for the weight calculation
00088   Float_t         weight=1;
00089   Float_t         r9weight[2]={1,1};
00090   Float_t         ptweight[2]={1,1};
00091   Float_t         mcGenWeight=1;
00092   Int_t           smearerCat[2];
00093   bool hasSmearerCat=false;
00094 
00095   // for toy repartition
00096   ULong64_t eventNumber;
00097 
00098   //------------------------------
00099   chain->SetBranchAddress("eventNumber", &eventNumber);
00100 
00101   chain->SetBranchAddress(_energyBranchName, energyEle);
00102   if(chain->GetBranch("scaleEle")!=NULL){
00103     if(isToy==false || (externToy==true && isToy==true && isMC==false)){
00104     std::cout << "[STATUS] Adding electron energy correction branch from friend" << std::endl;
00105     chain->SetBranchAddress("scaleEle", corrEle_);
00106     cutter._corrEle=true;
00107     }
00108   } 
00109 
00110   if(chain->GetBranch("smearEle")!=NULL){
00111     if(isToy==false || (externToy==true && isToy==true && isMC==false)){
00112       std::cout << "[STATUS] Adding electron energy smearing branch from friend" << std::endl;
00113       chain->SetBranchAddress("smearEle", smearEle_);
00114     } 
00115   }
00116 
00117   chain->SetBranchAddress("etaEle", etaEle);
00118   chain->SetBranchAddress("phiEle", phiEle);
00119 
00120 
00121   if(chain->GetBranch("puWeight")!=NULL){
00122     std::cout << "[STATUS] Getting puWeight branch for tree: " << chain->GetTitle() << std::endl;
00123     chain->SetBranchAddress("puWeight", &weight);
00124   }
00125 
00126   if(chain->GetBranch("r9Weight")!=NULL){
00127     std::cout << "[STATUS] Getting r9Weight branch for tree: " << chain->GetTitle() << std::endl;
00128     chain->SetBranchAddress("r9Weight", r9weight);
00129   }  
00130 
00131   if(chain->GetBranch("ptWeight")!=NULL){
00132     std::cout << "[STATUS] Getting ptWeight branch for tree: " <<  chain->GetTitle() << std::endl;
00133     chain->SetBranchAddress("ptWeight", ptweight);
00134   }
00135 
00136   if(chain->GetBranch("mcGenWeight")!=NULL){
00137     std::cout << "[STATUS] Getting mcGenWeight branch for tree: " <<  chain->GetTitle() << std::endl;
00138     chain->SetBranchAddress("mcGenWeight", &mcGenWeight);
00139   }
00140 
00141   if(chain->GetBranch("smearerCat")!=NULL){
00142     std::cout << "[STATUS] Getting smearerCat branch for tree: " <<  chain->GetTitle() << std::endl;
00143     chain->SetBranchAddress("smearerCat", smearerCat);
00144     hasSmearerCat=true;
00145   }
00146 
00147   if(hasSmearerCat==false){
00148     std::cerr << "[ERROR] Must have smearerCat branch" << std::endl;
00149     exit(1);
00150   }
00151   Long64_t entries = chain->GetEntryList()->GetN();
00152   if(nEvents>0 && nEvents<entries){
00153     std::cout << "[INFO] Importing only " << nEvents << " events" << std::endl;
00154     entries=nEvents;
00155   }
00156   chain->LoadTree(chain->GetEntryNumber(0));
00157   Long64_t treenumber=-1;
00158 
00159   std::vector< std::pair<TTreeFormula*, TTreeFormula*> > catSelectors;
00160   if(hasSmearerCat==false){
00161   for(std::vector<TString>::const_iterator region_ele1_itr = _regionList.begin();
00162       region_ele1_itr != _regionList.end();
00163       region_ele1_itr++){
00164     for(std::vector<TString>::const_iterator region_ele2_itr = region_ele1_itr;
00165         region_ele2_itr != _regionList.end();
00166         region_ele2_itr++){
00167 
00168       if(region_ele2_itr==region_ele1_itr){
00169         TString region=*region_ele1_itr;
00170         region.ReplaceAll(_commonCut,"");
00171         TTreeFormula *selector = new TTreeFormula("selector"+(region), cutter.GetCut(region+oddString, isMC), chain);
00172         catSelectors.push_back(std::pair<TTreeFormula*, TTreeFormula*>(selector,NULL));
00173         //selector->Print();
00174       } else if(!_onlyDiagonal){
00175         TString region1=*region_ele1_itr;
00176         TString region2=*region_ele2_itr;
00177         region1.ReplaceAll(_commonCut,"");
00178         region2.ReplaceAll(_commonCut,"");
00179         TTreeFormula *selector1 = new TTreeFormula("selector1"+region1+region2, 
00180                                                    cutter.GetCut(region1+oddString, isMC, 1) && 
00181                                                    cutter.GetCut(region2+oddString, isMC, 2),
00182                                                    chain);
00183         TTreeFormula *selector2 = new TTreeFormula("selector2"+region1+region2,
00184                                                    cutter.GetCut(region1+oddString, isMC, 2) && 
00185                                                    cutter.GetCut(region2+oddString, isMC, 1),
00186                                                    chain);
00187         catSelectors.push_back(std::pair<TTreeFormula*, TTreeFormula*>(selector1,selector2));
00188         //selector1->Print();
00189         //selector2->Print();
00190         
00191       } else catSelectors.push_back(std::pair<TTreeFormula*, TTreeFormula*>(NULL, NULL));
00192         
00193     }
00194   }
00195   }
00196 
00197   for(Long64_t jentry=0; jentry < entries; jentry++){
00198     Long64_t entryNumber= chain->GetEntryNumber(jentry);
00199     chain->GetEntry(entryNumber);
00200     if(isToy){
00201       int modulo=eventNumber%5;
00202       if(jentry<10){
00203         std::cout << "Dividing toyMC events: " << isMC << "\t" << eventNumber << "\t" << modulo
00204                   << "\t" << mcGenWeight 
00205                   << std::endl;
00206         
00207       }
00208 
00209       if(isMC && modulo<2) continue;
00210       if(!isMC && modulo>=2) continue;
00211     }
00212 
00213     // reject events:
00214     if(weight>3) continue;
00215 
00216     if (hasSmearerCat==false && chain->GetTreeNumber() != treenumber) {
00217       treenumber = chain->GetTreeNumber();
00218       for(std::vector< std::pair<TTreeFormula*, TTreeFormula*> >::const_iterator catSelector_itr = catSelectors.begin();
00219           catSelector_itr != catSelectors.end();
00220           catSelector_itr++){
00221         
00222         catSelector_itr->first->UpdateFormulaLeaves();
00223         if(catSelector_itr->second!=NULL)       catSelector_itr->second->UpdateFormulaLeaves();
00224       }
00225     }
00226 
00227     int evIndex=-1;
00228     bool _swap=false;
00229     if(!hasSmearerCat){
00230       for(std::vector< std::pair<TTreeFormula*, TTreeFormula*> >::const_iterator catSelector_itr = catSelectors.begin();
00231           catSelector_itr != catSelectors.end();
00232           catSelector_itr++){
00233         _swap=false;
00234         TTreeFormula *sel1 = catSelector_itr->first;
00235         TTreeFormula *sel2 = catSelector_itr->second;
00236         if(sel1==NULL) continue; // is it possible?
00237         if(sel1->EvalInstance()==false){
00238           if(sel2==NULL || sel2->EvalInstance()==false) continue;
00239           else _swap=true;
00240         }
00241 
00242         evIndex=catSelector_itr-catSelectors.begin();
00243       }
00244     }else{
00245       evIndex=smearerCat[0];
00246       _swap=smearerCat[1];
00247       if(jentry<2) std::cout << evIndex << "\t" << _swap << std::endl;
00248     }
00249     if(evIndex<0) continue; // event in no category
00250 
00251     ZeeEvent event;
00252     //       if(jentry<30){
00253     //  //chain->Show(chain->GetEntryNumber(jentry));
00254     //  std::cout << "[INFO] corrEle[0] = " << corrEle_[0] << std::endl;
00255     //  std::cout << "[INFO] corrEle[1] = " << corrEle_[1] << std::endl;
00256     //  std::cout << "[INFO] smearEle[0] = " << smearEle_[0] << std::endl;
00257     //  std::cout << "[INFO] smearEle[1] = " << smearEle_[1] << std::endl;
00258     //  std::cout << "[INFO] Category = " << evIndex << std::endl;
00259     //       }
00260     
00261     float t1=TMath::Exp(-etaEle[0]);
00262     float t2=TMath::Exp(-etaEle[1]);
00263     float t1q = t1*t1;
00264     float t2q = t2*t2;
00265     
00266     //------------------------------
00267     if(_swap){
00268       event.energy_ele2 = energyEle[0] * corrEle_[0] * smearEle_[0];
00269       event.energy_ele1 = energyEle[1] * corrEle_[1] * smearEle_[1];
00270     } else {
00271       event.energy_ele1 = energyEle[0] * corrEle_[0] * smearEle_[0];
00272       event.energy_ele2 = energyEle[1] * corrEle_[1] * smearEle_[1];
00273     }
00274     //event.angle_eta_ele1_ele2=  (1-((1-t1q)*(1-t2q)+4*t1*t2*cos(phiEle[0]-phiEle[1]))/((1+t1q)*(1+t2q)));
00275     event.invMass= sqrt(2 * event.energy_ele1 * event.energy_ele2 *
00276                         (1-((1-t1q)*(1-t2q)+4*t1*t2*cos(phiEle[0]-phiEle[1]))/((1+t1q)*(1+t2q)))
00277                         );
00278     if(_isSmearingEt){
00279       if(_swap){
00280         event.energy_ele2/=cosh(etaEle[0]);
00281         event.energy_ele1/=cosh(etaEle[1]);
00282       } else{
00283         event.energy_ele1/=cosh(etaEle[0]);
00284         event.energy_ele2/=cosh(etaEle[1]);
00285       } 
00286     }
00287     // to calculate the invMass: invMass = sqrt(2 * energy_ele1 * energy_ele2 * angle_eta_ele1_ele2)
00288     if(event.invMass < 70 || event.invMass > 110) continue;
00289 
00290     event.weight = 1.;
00291     if(_usePUweight) event.weight *= weight;
00292     if(_useR9weight) event.weight *= r9weight[0]*r9weight[1];
00293     if(_usePtweight) event.weight *= ptweight[0]*ptweight[1];
00294     if(mcGenWeight != -1){
00295       if(_useMCweight && !_excludeByWeight) event.weight *= mcGenWeight;
00296 
00297       if(_excludeByWeight && mcGenWeight!=1){
00298         float rnd = excludeGen.Rndm();
00299         if(jentry < 10)  std::cout << "mcGen = " << mcGenWeight << "\t" << rnd << std::endl;
00300         if(mcGenWeight < rnd){ 
00301           
00302           excludedByWeight++;
00303           continue;
00304         } // else event.weight=1;
00305       }
00306     }
00307 #ifdef FIXEDSMEARINGS
00308     if(isMC){
00309       event.smearings_ele1 = new float[NSMEARTOYLIM];
00310       event.smearings_ele2 = new float[NSMEARTOYLIM];
00311       for(int i=0; i < NSMEARTOYLIM; i++){
00312         event.smearings_ele1[i] = (float) gen.Gaus(0,1);
00313         event.smearings_ele2[i] = (float) gen.Gaus(0,1);
00314       }
00315     }else{
00316       event.smearings_ele1 = new float[1];
00317       event.smearings_ele2 = new float[1];
00318       event.smearings_ele1[0] = (float) gen.Gaus(0,1);
00319       event.smearings_ele2[0] = (float) gen.Gaus(0,1);
00320     }   
00321 #endif
00322     includedEvents++;
00323     cache.at(evIndex).push_back(event);
00324     //(cache[evIndex]).push_back(event);
00325   }
00326 
00327   std::cout << "[INFO] Importing events: " << includedEvents << "; events excluded by weight: " << excludedByWeight << std::endl;
00328   chain->ResetBranchAddresses();
00329   chain->GetEntry(0);
00330   return;
00331 
00332 
00333 }
00334 
00335 SmearingImporter::regions_cache_t SmearingImporter::GetCache(TChain *_chain, bool isMC, bool odd, Long64_t nEvents, bool isToy, bool externToy){
00336 
00337   TString eleID_="eleID_"+_eleID;
00338 
00339   TString oddString;
00340   if(odd) oddString+="-odd";
00341   regions_cache_t cache;
00342   TStopwatch myClock;
00343   myClock.Start();
00344   _chain->GetEntry(0);
00345 
00346   _chain->SetBranchStatus("*", 0);
00347 
00348   _chain->SetBranchStatus("etaEle", 1);
00349   _chain->SetBranchStatus("phiEle", 1);
00350   _chain->SetBranchStatus(_energyBranchName, 1);
00351   if(isToy) _chain->SetBranchStatus("eventNumber",1);
00352   //  std::cout << _chain->GetBranchStatus("seedXSCEle") <<  std::endl;
00353   //  std::cout << _chain->GetBranchStatus("etaEle") <<  std::endl;
00354 
00355   if(_chain->GetBranch("scaleEle")!=NULL){
00356     std::cout << "[STATUS] Activating branch scaleEle" << std::endl;
00357     _chain->SetBranchStatus("scaleEle", 1);
00358     cutter._corrEle=true;
00359   }
00360 
00361   if(_chain->GetBranch("smearEle")!=NULL){
00362     std::cout << "[STATUS] Activating branch smearEle" << std::endl;
00363     _chain->SetBranchStatus("smearEle", 1);
00364   } 
00365 
00366  
00367   if(_chain->GetBranch("r9Weight")!=NULL)  _chain->SetBranchStatus("r9Weight", 1);
00368   if(_chain->GetBranch("puWeight")!=NULL)  _chain->SetBranchStatus("puWeight", 1);
00369   if(_chain->GetBranch("ptWeight")!=NULL)  _chain->SetBranchStatus("ptWeight", 1);
00370   if(_chain->GetBranch("mcGenWeight")!=NULL)  _chain->SetBranchStatus("mcGenWeight", 1);
00371   if(_chain->GetBranch("smearerCat")!=NULL){
00372     //std::cout << "[STATUS] Activating branch smearerCat" << std::endl;
00373     _chain->SetBranchStatus("smearerCat", 1);
00374   }
00375 
00376 
00377 
00378   for(std::vector<TString>::const_iterator region_ele1_itr = _regionList.begin();
00379       region_ele1_itr != _regionList.end();
00380       region_ele1_itr++){
00381     std::set<TString> branchNames = cutter.GetBranchNameNtuple(_commonCut+"-"+eleID_+"-"+*region_ele1_itr);
00382     for(std::set<TString>::const_iterator itr = branchNames.begin();
00383         itr != branchNames.end(); itr++){
00384       _chain->SetBranchStatus(*itr, "1");
00385     }
00386   }
00387  
00388   TString evListName="evList_";
00389   evListName+=_chain->GetTitle();
00390   evListName+="_all";
00391   TEntryList *oldList = _chain->GetEntryList();
00392   if(oldList==NULL){
00393     std::cout << "[STATUS] Setting entry list: " << evListName << std::endl;
00394     _chain->Draw(">>"+evListName, cutter.GetCut(_commonCut+"-"+eleID_,isMC), "entrylist");
00395     //_chain->Draw(">>"+evListName, "", "entrylist");
00396     TEntryList *elist_all = (TEntryList*)gDirectory->Get(evListName);
00397     //  elist_all->SetBit(!kCanDelete);
00398     _chain->SetEntryList(elist_all);
00399   }
00400   for(std::vector<TString>::const_iterator region_ele1_itr = _regionList.begin();
00401       region_ele1_itr != _regionList.end();
00402       region_ele1_itr++){
00403     for(std::vector<TString>::const_iterator region_ele2_itr = region_ele1_itr;
00404         region_ele2_itr != _regionList.end();
00405         region_ele2_itr++){
00406       
00407       event_cache_t eventCache;
00408       cache.push_back(eventCache);
00409     }
00410   }
00411 
00412   Import(_chain, cache, oddString, isMC, nEvents, isToy, externToy);
00413 #ifdef DEBUG
00414   int index=0;
00415   for(std::vector<TString>::const_iterator region_ele1_itr = _regionList.begin();
00416       region_ele1_itr != _regionList.end();
00417       region_ele1_itr++){
00418     for(std::vector<TString>::const_iterator region_ele2_itr = region_ele1_itr;
00419         region_ele2_itr != _regionList.end();
00420         region_ele2_itr++){
00421       std::cout << "[INFO] Category " << index << " " <<  *region_ele1_itr << *region_ele2_itr
00422                 << " filled with " << cache[index].size() << " entries" 
00423                 << std::endl;
00424       index++;
00425     }
00426   }
00427 #endif
00428   myClock.Stop();
00429   myClock.Print();
00430   return cache;
00431 }
